data: “O Barbara! _do_ you think papa and mamma will let us go? _Can_ they afford it? Just to think of Italy, and sunshine, and olive trees, and cathedrals, and pictures! Oh, it makes me wild! Will you not ask them, dear Barbara? You are braver than I, and can talk better about it all.”

Barbara's Heritage
Young Americans Among the Old Italian Masters
